casebody.data:
DAVIS
v.
CHEROKEE CASINO No. 456A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2006. Allen C. Smith, Andrew S. Culicerto, Charlotte, Margaret M. Kinston, for Casino, et al. D. Andrew Turman, Spartanburg, SC, for Davis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of December 2006 by NCATL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule *44928(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of December 2006."
